gameplay.title: Gameplay
gameplay.objectiveDesc: Run as far as possible while avoiding enemies and collecting power-ups. Your distance traveled is your score.
gameplay.enemiesDesc: Samurais appear every 50m and shoot shurikens. Shoot them 3 times to defeat them. Ninjas and bosses appear at higher distances.
gameplay.powerUpsDesc: Collect power-ups to gain temporary advantages: Shield (protection), Infinite Ammo (unlimited shots), Speed Boost (faster movement), Multi Shot (multiple projectiles).

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: Time your jumps carefully to avoid enemies and obstacles
tips.tip2: Save your rice rockets for difficult situations
tips.tip3: Collect power-ups whenever possible to increase your survival chances
tips.tip4: The difficulty increases every 1000m - be prepared for more challenging enemies
